operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO auth_seq_updates (auth_id, user_id, seq, update_type, update_data, date2) VALUES (:auth_id, :user_id, :seq, :update_type, :update_data, :date2)

operation.name: SelectLastSeq
operation.sql: SELECT seq FROM auth_seq_updates WHERE auth_id = :auth_id AND user_id = :user_id ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectByGtSeq
operation.sql: SELECT auth_id, user_id, seq, update_type, update_data, date2 FROM auth_seq_updates WHERE auth_id = :auth_id AND user_id = :user_id AND seq > :seq ORDER BY seq

operation.name: SelectByGtDate
operation.sql: SELECT auth_id, user_id, seq, update_type, update_data, date2 FROM auth_seq_updates WHERE auth_id = :auth_id AND user_id = :user_id AND date2 > :date2 ORDER BY seq
